decks.notes: This deck focuses on using disruptive spells like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will to control the board while deploying efficient threats like Brazen Borrower, Murktide Regent, and Nethergoyf. The goal is to apply pressure early on with aggressive creatures and disrupt the opponent's game plan with counterspells and hand disruption. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push to deal with opposing threats. The mana base is focused on providing the colors necessary to cast the spells in the deck efficiently.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo utilizing Mystic Forge and various mana acceleration cards to generate a large amount of mana quickly. The goal is to cast multiple spells in a turn, activate Mystic Forge to dig through the deck for important cards, and ultimately win the game through explosive plays and efficient card advantage. The deck also includes artifacts that can lock down opponents' resources and disrupt their strategies, giving the pilot multiple angles of attack to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently dump powerful creatures into the graveyard, such as Archon of Cruelty or Atraxa, Grand Unifier, and then resummon them using cards like Reanimate or Animate Dead. The deck also includes control elements like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps dig for key cards, while cards like Brainstorm and Ponder provide further card selection. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures while maintaining control of the game.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures, then using cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring them back onto the battlefield for a devastating combo. It includes powerful control elements like Force of Will and Thoughtseize to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also features card selection and manipulation with cards like Ponder and Brainstorm to help find combo pieces quickly. With efficient mana base and a mix of creatures and spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with explosive plays and powerful creatures.

The main idea of this deck is to utilize aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By using cards like Magus of the Moon, Chalice of the Void, and Blood Moon, the deck aims to shut down the opponent's mana base and prevent them from mounting a defense. Additionally, cards like Pyrogoyf and Broadside Bombardiers provide a strong offensive presence, while cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Sundering Eruption offer removal options. With a focus on fast and efficient plays, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent can establish a stable board presence.

This legacy deck focuses on aggression and disruption, utilizing cards like Goblin Bombardment and Cabal Therapy to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes a mix of powerful creatures like Samwise the Stouthearted and Orcish Bowmasters, along with support cards like Swords to Plowshares and Thoughtseize. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide additional aggression and synergy with the creature base. With a mix of lands for fixing and disruption like Wasteland and Karakas, this deck aims to outpace and disrupt the opponent for a quick victory.

The main concept of this Legacy deck is to aggressively disrupt and control your opponent's resources while applying pressure with aggressive creatures and burn effects. The deck aims to play cards like Swords to Plowshares, Thoughtseize, and Cabal Therapy to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while utilizing cards like Goblin Bombardment and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah to deal direct damage and finish off the opponent. The deck also includes a mix of versatile creatures such as Orcish Bowmasters and Voice of Victory to provide additional threats and resilience. The mana base is built to support the aggressive strategy with efficient lands like Wasteland and Bloodstained Mire.

This deck focuses on leveraging the power of Mystic Forge to generate powerful combos and card advantage. By utilizing artifacts such as Grim Monolith, Basalt Monolith, and Voltaic Key, along with other key pieces like Tezzeret and Karn, the deck can quickly assemble game-winning combinations. The inclusion of cards like Pithing Needle and Soul-Guide Lantern helps to disrupt opponents' strategies while cards like Urza's Saga and Planar Nexus provide additional mana and utility. Ultimately, the goal is to create a powerful board state and overwhelm the opponent with powerful synergies and combos.

The deck is focused on quickly assembling a combo to win the game by milling oneself using creatures like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer, then utilizing cards like Dread Return to bring back Thassa's Oracle and win the game instantly. The deck also uses fast mana like Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal to accelerate its game plan, along with disruption like Pact of Negation and Thoughtseize to protect the combo. The deck aims to win as quickly as possible, often sacrificing consistency for speed and explosiveness.

The main goal of this deck is to quickly and efficiently combo off by using cards like Dark Ritual, Lotus Petal, and Simian Spirit Guide to generate mana and cast a sequence of zero-cost spells. The deck aims to quickly assemble the necessary pieces to cast spells like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer, which mill the entire library into the graveyard. This sets up for a win condition like Thassa's Oracle to be cast and win the game on the spot. The deck is focused on a fast and powerful combo strategy that aims to win the game in one explosive turn.

The main concept of this deck is to control the tempo of the game by disrupting your opponent's strategy while quickly putting pressure on them with efficient creatures and removal spells. The deck aims to maintain card advantage through cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Thoughtseize, while also utilizing counterspells like Force of Will and Daze to protect your own threats. The inclusion of cards like Fatal Push and Nihil Spellbomb help deal with opposing threats, while aggressive creatures like Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf aim to quickly close out the game. Utilizing its mana base and disruptive spells effectively, this deck aims to outmaneuver and overwhelm its opponents in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and aggressively play low-cost spells and creatures to pressure the opponent while also disrupting their strategy with cards like Stifle, Force of Will, and Wasteland. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent, while also maintaining card advantage with cantrips like Preordain and Ponder. The inclusion of powerful removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat help to keep the opponent's board in check. Overall, the deck focuses on tempo and aggression to overwhelm the opponent.

Utilize a combination of reanimation spells and powerful creatures to quickly overwhelm your opponent and win the game. The deck focuses on quickly filling your graveyard with key creatures, such as Murktide Regent and Archon of Cruelty, using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize. Utilize counterspells like Force of Will and Daze to protect your combo pieces and disrupt your opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to win the game in a few quick turns by bringing back powerful creatures from the graveyard and utilizing powerful spells to control the game.

The main concept of this Dragon Stompy deck is to aggressively disrupt the opponent's mana base by utilizing cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chrome Mox. The deck aims to quickly play out powerful threats such as Broadside Bombardiers and Pyrogoyf, while also using cards like The One Ring and Sundering Eruption to deal with any problematic permanents. With a focus on locking down the opponent's resources and maintaining a strong board presence, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy while quickly deploying threats like Murktide Regent, Delver of Secrets, and Dragon's Rage Channeler to close out the game. It utilizes efficient card draw and selection spells like Ponder, Brainstorm, and Mishra's Bauble to maintain a strong hand advantage. The deck also includes a suite of disruptive spells like Force of Will, Daze, and Lightning Bolt to protect its threats and remove opposing threats. The overall strategy is to apply pressure early and maintain control throughout the game.

The deck focuses on quickly casting a series of spells to mill the entire library in order to win the game with Thassa's Oracle. The deck utilizes various fast mana sources, discard spells, and combo pieces like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer to achieve this win condition. The goal is to assemble the combo as quickly as possible while protecting it with Pact of Negation. The deck is designed to be all-in on the combo and can be explosive when everything comes together smoothly.
